ing: 4 cups SwansonÂ® Chicken Broth or SwansonÂ® Certified Organic Chicken Broth or SwansonÂ® Natural GoodnessÂ® Chicken Broth
1 cup shredded cooked chicken or turkey
des: "Sometimes you just want a good, old-fashioned chicken noodle soup...no fancy ingredients...just great flavor.  Give this version a try...all you need is 6 ingredients and 35 minutes to make a home-style soup that you'll really enjoy."
ins:
Heat the broth, 1 generous dash ground black pepper, carrot and celery in a 2-quart saucepan over medium-high heat to a boil.
Stir the noodles and chicken in the saucepan. Reduce the heat to medium. Cook for 10 minutes or until the noodles are tender, stirring occasionally.
